page.title: 05FARMING : GENERAL
page.content: THE FARMS NORTH OF FORFAR INCLUDE { {WOLFLAW,BATTLEDYKES,MEADOWS,QUILKOE, {BLAIRYFEDDON,WARDMILL,BAGGERTON, {BOGINDOLLO AND BIRKENBUSH}WITH THE AVERAGE SIZE OF THE FARMS BEING{236} ACRES.MIXED ARABLE IS THE TYPE OF FARMING THAT TAKES PLACE. THE MAIN CROPS GROWN ON THESE FARMS ARE {BARLEY,WHEAT AND POTATOES}WITH THREE FARMS{QUILKOE,WARDMILL}AND {BLAIRYFEDDON}GROWING{OIL SEED RAPE.} LIVESTOCK IN THIS AREA IS MOSTLY {CATTLE,}BUT THERE ARE SOME FARMS WHICH HAVE{SHEEP.} NONE OF THE FARMS USE THE{LEMNO {BURN}FOR IRRIGATION SINCE IT IS TOO FAR AWAY. BY FAR THE LARGEST FARM IN THIS AREA IS{BOGINDOLLO}WHICH IS{490}ACRES IN SIZE.
